title: Amazon Product Researcher
description:
Urgent Hiring: Amazon Product Researcher (Toys Category)

Reports To: CEO

Work Hours: Philippines daytime work hours



ONLY APPLICANTS WHO WILL APPLY THROUGH THE LINK WILL BE ENTERTAINED.



Company Vision:

We want to work with you to grow our company while helping you to become a superstar in your field. We value problem solvers, go getters, people with opinions who want to make an impact. You will be on the leading edge of Amazon and online strategies and will be continually improving your knowledge in the pursuit of helping us grow our business.

At the same time, you will be working with a company that values community & family in both our internal and customer facing sides. Our mission is to delight kids & parents with creative craft kits and related products. We are 100% focused on that mission and want you to be there on the ride with us!

That’s where you come in as our next Amazon Fee & Unit Economics Management Accountant



Role Purpose

The Amazon Product Researcher plays a critical role in driving new product innovation and continuous product improvement for our toy brand. This role exists to support the CEO by delivering clear, data-backed insights on what products to launch next and how to improve existing products, using deep competitive research on Amazon.



This person is obsessed with understanding toy trends, customer behavior, and competitive gaps. Through systematic research of Amazon listings, reviews, pricing, features, and emerging trends, the Product Researcher helps ensure that every product decision is grounded in real market demand and customer feedback.



What Success Looks Like:

Success in the Amazon Product Researcher role means the CEO always has clear, confident direction on what products to launch and how to improve existing ones. A successful researcher consistently surfaces high-potential toy opportunities before competitors, supported by strong data around demand, competition, pricing, and differentiation. Their research eliminates guesswork and replaces it with clarity.



Additionally, success is reflected in the continuous improvement of current products. By analyzing customer reviews across our listings and competitors’, this role identifies recurring pain points, unmet needs, and feature gaps that directly inform product upgrades. Over time, these insights lead to stronger reviews, fewer recurring complaints, and products that stand out clearly in crowded Amazon toy categories.



Primary Objectives

• Research Amazon toy market trends and emerging product opportunities

• Analyze competitor products to identify gaps, weaknesses, and differentiation opportunities

• Review and synthesize customer feedback to guide product improvements

• Prepare structured research reports to support CEO decision-making



Regular Work Activities

• Monitor Amazon toy category best sellers, new releases, and movers

• Analyze top competitor listings (features, pricing, images, positioning)

• Track emerging toy trends by age group, theme, and seasonality

• Perform deep review mining on competitor and internal products

• Identify recurring customer complaints and unmet needs

• Summarize review sentiment into clear improvement recommendations

• Research potential product variations, bundles, or line extensions

• Evaluate demand, competition level, and differentiation potential

• Create clear research briefs for new product ideas

• Maintain a database of researched products and insights

• Support CEO with ad hoc product research requests

• Compare pricing strategies and perceived value across competitors

• Identify opportunities to improve safety, durability, or play value

• Highlight trends related to gifting, education, and seasonal demand

• Present findings in simple, actionable formats (slides or docs)

• Track historical trends to validate long-term opportunity strength



Key Skills Required

• Strong analytical and critical thinking skills

• Deep curiosity about toys, trends, and customer behavior

• Strong attention to detail

• Strong spreadsheet skills

• Clear written communication and reporting skills

• Pattern recognition and trend analysis

• Independent problem-solving mindset

• Data-driven decision making

• Growth-oriented and improvement-focused



People Contacts and Interactions

• Direct report to the CEO

• Frequent communication with

• Operations Team

• China Based Production Team



Role Requirements

Experience, Training, and Education

• Familiarity with Amazon listings, categories, and ranking dynamics

• Experience analyzing customer reviews for insights

• Strong Excel or Google Sheets skills

• Comfort working with qualitative and quantitative data

• E-commerce or Amazon private label experience preferred

• Experience in toys or consumer products is a plus

• Ability to work independently with minimal oversight

• High level of personal accountability

• Proven ability to turn research into actionable recommendations



How to Apply:

title: Capcut/ TikTok Editor
description:
Hiring for part-time work for a Capcut / TikTok editor



You will be making TikTok videos using Capcup or the video editing software of your choice. The editing process is fairly simple and straightforward. Anyone who is proficient in video editing should have no problem with the basic tasks such as:

- Cutting dead space in talking head videos

- Adding overlay images on screen in the videos

- Minor effects such as dynamic zoom, cropping, etc.

- Producing b-roll content from voiceover and footage provided, having the ability to digest what is being said and pair up the audio with corresponding footage



Please review a few examples of my content to ensure you are familiar and comfortable with the editing style:

1. Basic talking head - here you are mostly editing dead space and piecing clips together, adding minor effects like crop and zoom to make the frames look more dynamic and seamless.







2. Talking head with overlays - same as before, but adding images provided to you on the screen to support what is being said in the video.







3. B-roll content - you will be provided a voice over and need to work through the footage to find fitting visuals. A strong understanding of English and social media content is crucial here.







You will be working hand in hand with me on an extremely viral social media page and there is room for bonuses if deadlines are met and the content performs well!



Requirements:

- Attention to detail

- STRONG English

title: Detail-Obsessed QA engineer for World Class Shopify Builds
description:
BTF — Premium Ecommerce CRO & Design Agency



This is not a standard QA role.



You are not here to check if everything works.

You are not here to say “looks fine.”

You are here to make sure everything that ships is world-class.



QA at BTF is standards control. Our standards are the business.



If something goes live and it isn’t at the level we expect, QA failed.

Not dev. Not design. QA.



If you approve a build, you are personally vouching that it meets our standard.

If it doesn’t feel like something a top-tier brand would ship, it does not go live.



You are the final gate before launch.



About Us



We’re a high-end ecommerce CRO and design agency building and optimizing Shopify stores for serious brands.

We focus on premium execution; tight design, strong copy, clean dev, and obsessive attention to detail.



We’re not trying to be average.

We’re trying to ship some of the cleanest ecommerce experiences in the space.



This role exists to protect that.



You’ll be involved in shipping high-standard builds and iterations for growing ecommerce brands; and you’ll have real authority over what goes live.



Core Mandate



Your job is to find imperfections.



Not obvious ones.

Small ones.

Microscopic ones.



The kind most people would ignore.



You are expected to notice:



1px spacing inconsistencies



alignment that feels slightly off



hover states that aren’t fully polished



animation timing that feels cheap



responsiveness issues at edge breakpoints



cross-browser rendering differences



small UX friction points



These are not nitpicks here.

This is the job.



If a detail feels almost ridiculous to flag, that’s usually exactly the level of attention we expect.



If you cannot find issues, you are not looking hard enough.



“All good” is not an acceptable QA outcome.



What You’ll Be Doing



You’ll be QA’ing:



Shopify storefronts



landing pages and PDPs



new features and site iterations



CRO tests and experiments



design/dev handoffs before launch



You will:



compare builds against Figma



check responsiveness across devices



test interactions and states



identify visual inconsistencies



catch regressions when new features are added



document issues clearly with screenshots or Looms



hold builds until everything is resolved



Often we are adding new features to existing live stores.

That means your job isn’t just checking what’s new; it’s ensuring nothing else broke in the process.



If something regresses anywhere on the site, you catch it.



How You Work



You naturally:



zoom in on everything



resize constantly



test edge cases



check across browsers



question polish



assume something is wrong until proven otherwise



You’re comfortable being the person who says:

“Not ready yet.”



You don’t approve builds lightly.

You take ownership seriously.



Who This Role Is For



Someone who:



is extremely detail-oriented



has high taste for design and polish



notices tiny inconsistencies instantly



enjoys spotting what others miss



takes pride in precision



wants to be part of shipping top-tier work



You don’t need to come from a big agency.

But you do need a sharp eye and high standards.



Experience with Shopify or ecommerce QA is a plus; but obsessive attention to detail matters more.



Who This Is Not For



This will not work if you:



rush checks



only look for obvious bugs



are comfortable shipping “mostly fine”



don’t care about micro-details



want a passive checklist role



This is an ownership role.



Authority



QA has final sign-off before launch.



If you flag issues and they aren’t resolved, the build does not ship.

You are trusted to protect the standard.



To Apply



Send:



A short intro



Any relevant QA or review experience



A Loom where you QA any e-commerce site and list every issue you can find



We’re looking for someone who naturally sees what others miss and wants to be part of shipping very high-quality work.



If that’s you, apply.

title: Capcut/ TikTok Editor
description:
Hiring for part-time work for a Capcut / TikTok editor

title: Research Assistant
description:
Research Assistant – Data & Organisation (Part
)

I need someone who can take large amounts of raw information and make it usable.



Multiple roles available



Book directly for an interview session here:  





The work:



You'll spend most of your time sorting through material, transcripts, links, documents, data, and organising it into structures that are easy to navigate and reference later.



What you'll do:



- Go through transcripts and pull out key information

- Collate data into spreadsheets and keep them clean and up to date

- Curate and organise collections of online links and resources

- Tag, categorise, and structure information so it's findable

- Follow a system when one exists, suggest one when it doesn't



What matters:



- You're methodical and enjoy bringing order to messy information

- You're comfortable working in Google Sheets and Docs

- You can read through long material without losing focus or accuracy

- You make sensible decisions about how to categorise things

- You don't need to be told every step, you can see what tidy looks like and get there



Details:

- Remote / flexible hours

- Pay discussed after skills screening

It also means that you apply once and you are considered for our other roles now and in the future

I look forward to seeing you in this session

title: Personal assistant onsite  (Driver License is a must)
description:
Job Title



Executive Secretary / Personal Assistant to CEO



Location



[Riyadh, Saudi Arabia]



Position Overview



We are seeking a highly capable Executive Secretary / Personal Assistant to provide strategic and operational support to senior leadership. This role requires exceptional organizational ability, discretion, strong digital fluency, and the capacity to operate in a fast-paced, high-expectation environment.



The ideal candidate is proactive, technically advanced, detail-oriented, and capable of managing both business and selective personal affairs with professionalism and confidentiality.



?



Key Responsibilities



Executive Support

 • Manage complex calendars, scheduling across time zones

 • Coordinate meetings, board materials, and executive briefings

 • Prepare reports, presentations, and correspondence

 • Screen and prioritize communications

 • Track action items and ensure follow-through



Operational & Administrative Management

 • Organize travel (international & domestic), visas, itineraries

 • Manage expense reports and documentation

 • Liaise with internal teams, stakeholders, and external partners

 • Maintain structured digital filing systems

 • Support event planning and executive engagements



Personal Affairs Support (as required)

 • Oversee personal appointments and scheduling

 • Coordinate household or lifestyle logistics when needed

 • Maintain strict confidentiality at all times



?



Technical & Software Requirements



Candidate must be highly proficient in:

 • Microsoft 365 (Outlook, Excel, PowerPoint, Word – advanced level)

 • AI productivity tools (ChatGPT, automation tools, smart workflows)

 • Cloud storage systems (SharePoint, Google Drive, Dropbox)

 • Video conferencing platforms (Zoom, Teams)

 • Digital calendar and task management systems

 • Basic financial tracking and spreadsheet modeling

?



Qualifications

 • Excellent written and verbal communication skills

 • Strong organizational and time-management skills

 • Ability to anticipate needs and think ahead

 • High emotional intelligence and professional judgment

 • Absolute discretion and confidentiality



?



Additional Competitive Advantages



Candidates gain additional scoring points if they possess:

 • Valid driver’s license (driving is a plus)

 • Multilingual ability (English required; Arabic or other languages a plus)

 • Experience supporting high-net-worth individuals

 • International travel coordination experience

 • Basic legal or contract review familiarity

 • Event management experience

 • Strong research capabilities

 • Tech-savvy mindset with continuous learning attitude



Any additional skills or experience might add to your chances of getting this great job opportunity, so don’t forget mentioning any skill or experience  you possess. 



?



Personal Attributes

 • Structured and process-driven

 • Calm under pressure

 • Highly detail-oriented

 • Solution-oriented mindset

 • Professional appearance and conduct

 • Loyal and long-term oriented



?



Compensation



This is a well-compensated role aligned with experience, capability, and discretion level. Performance-based incentives may apply.
